item.title: Europe Had a Terrible Year, and It’s Probably Going to Get Worse
item.description: The continent’s parlous economy and ascendant far right foretell a grim future.

item.title: 3-Minute Christmas Market Rampage Shakes Germany

item.title: Police Fatally Shoot Man Who Drove Pickup Into Killeen Mall, Injuring 5
item.description: The police said the man was being investigated for possible drunken driving but instead of stopping, he smashed his pickup truck into a J.C. Penney.
